title: JOIN THE BULLETPROOF CLUB
body:
Hey guys!
I made a club called "BLP" which stands for 'bulletproof' as I hope that my team and I can stand strong in game and win as many victories possible. If you want to join my club, feel free to contact me by messaging me underneath this with your summoner name or on discord (add me @Bri#2374). BLP promotes sportsmanship, teamwork and make the game more enjoyable (without salty players and flaming). 

All welcome! Hope to see you on the rift! (and in my club!) 
- Cypher7

Terms & Conditions:
- must be in OCE (Oceania)

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

replies.body:
Hi 
Can I please join, your club sounds awesome
